SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Server

Class ServerModel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Server.ServerModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerModelLayer
public class ServerModel extends Object implements ServerModelLayer
This class represents the model of the server, managing user accounts, authentication, and lobbies.

  • Method Details

    • signUp

      public String signUp(ClientHandler ch, String username, String password) throws AccountAlreadyExistsException
      Registers a new user with the server.
      Parameters:
      ch - The client handler associated with the user.
      username - The username of the new user.
      password - The password of the new user.
      Throws:
      AccountAlreadyExistsException - If the account already exists.

    • login

      public String login(ClientHandler ch, String username, String password) throws AccountNotFoundException, AccountAlreadyLoggedInException, IncorrectPasswordException
      Authenticates a user with the server.
      Parameters:
      ch - The client handler associated with the user.
      username - The username of the user trying to log in.
      password - The password of the user trying to log in.
      Throws:
      AccountNotFoundException - If the account is not found.
      AccountAlreadyLoggedInException - If the account is already logged in.
      IncorrectPasswordException - If the password is incorrect.

    • createNewLobby

      public LobbyController createNewLobby(String lobbyName, String username, int targetNumberUsers, ClientHandler connection) throws LobbyNameAlreadyTakenException, InvalidLobbySettingsException
      Creates a new lobby.
      Parameters:
      lobbyName - The name of the new lobby.
      targetNumberUsers - Number of players the admin wants to start a game with.
      connection - The client handler associated with the user.
      Returns:
      The LobbyController object representing the new lobby.
      Throws:
      LobbyNameAlreadyTakenException - If the lobby name is already taken.
      InvalidLobbySettingsException

    • joinLobby

      public LobbyController joinLobby(String lobbyName, String username, ClientHandler connection) throws LobbyNotFoundException, LobbyClosedException, LobbyUserAlreadyConnectedException
      Joins an existing lobby.
      Parameters:
      lobbyName - The name of the lobby to join.
      connection - The client handler associated with the user.
      Returns:
      The LobbyController object representing the joined lobby.
      Throws:
      LobbyNotFoundException - If the lobby is not found.
      LobbyClosedException
      LobbyUserAlreadyConnectedException

    • addLobbyPreviewObserver

      public void addLobbyPreviewObserver(String username, ClientHandler ch)
      Adds an observer to lobby previews for a specific username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the observer to be added.
      ch - The ClientHandler instance associated with the observer.
